events.message: The claimant reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th, involving significant rear-end damage.
Claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following the review of the initial report and accident details.
An insurance agent specializing in vehicle collision claims was assigned to handle this case promptly.
Acknowledgment of the claim has been sent to the claimant with details of the next steps in the process.
Requested submission of police reports, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to support claim evaluation.
The claimant has provided all requested documents including police report and multiple repair shop estimates.
Investigators began reviewing submitted documents and inspecting vehicle damage to verify claim legitimacy.
Investigation concluded confirming the circumstances of the accident and validating the extent of reported damages.
An initial settlement offer was prepared based on damage estimates and policy coverage limits and communicated to claimant.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciation for the clear and timely communication.
Claim approval was finalized following acceptance of settlement terms by claimant and compliant policy verification.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the claimantâ€™s designated bank account without delay.
The claim was officially closed after payment issuance with confirmation sent to claimant and closing documentation archived.
